library(tidyverse)

Establish Connection
```{r}

pgdrv <- dbDriver(drvName = "PostgreSQL")
postgrescon <-DBI::dbConnect(pgdrv,
                    dbname="postgres",
                    host="localhost", port=5432,
                    user = 'postgres',
                    password = getPass("Enter Password:"))
```
